name: Cyber Sokoban
description:
Cyber Sokoban is a puzzle game inspired by Sokoban.

How to play ?
Move the futuristic cubes to their respective places, deactivate the leisures and go through the portals to pass the level.

Features:
50 hand-crafted levels with increasing complexity(Can you solve them all? )
Originally composed Soundtracks
Beautiful minimalist aesthetic
Playable with mouse and keyboard.
Isometric and perspective camera modes.
Unlimited undo moves.
